entry.title: tinymce safari
entry.content:
undefined is not an object (evaluating ‘o.createRange
tinymce safari evaluating ‘o.createRange’
Tinymce won’t initialize on Safari

entry.title: tinymce focus and set cursor caret position
entry.content:
setCursorLocation

tinyMCE.activeEditor.selection.select(tinyMCE.activeEditor.getBody(), true);
tinyMCE.activeEditor.selection.collapse(false);

tinyMCE.activeEditor.focus();

tinymce.execCommand(‘mceFocus’,false,’id_of_textarea’);

To cleanly remove an editor instance and avoid any errors use:

tinymce.EditorManager.execCommand(‘mceRemoveEditor’,true, editor_id);
To reinitialize the instance use:

tinymce.EditorManager.execCommand(‘mceAddEditor’,true, editor_id);

tinymce.execCommand(‘mceRemoveControl’, true, ‘my_original_textarea_id’);

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17759111/tinymce-4-remove-or-destroy
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19829126/tinymce-4-how-to-put-cursor-to-end-of-the-text
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1253303/whats-the-best-way-to-set-cursor-caret-position
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7962474/tinymce-insert-content-at-the-bottom
http://wordpress.stackexchange.com/questions/105961/insert-text-a-cursor-position-in-to-tinymce-text-editor
http://www.theblog.ca/tinymce-change-cursor-position
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2212552/how-do-you-set-the-focus-of-a-tinymce-textarea-element
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4651676/how-do-i-remove-tinymce-and-then-re-add-it
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20390743/how-do-i-set-content-in-tinymce-4-preferably-within-the-document-ready-bl

http://www.tinymce.com/forum/viewtopic.php?id=26386
entry.summary:
setCursorLocation

tinyMCE.activeEditor.selection.select(tinyMCE.activeEditor.getBody(), true);
tinyMCE.activeEditor.selection.collapse(false);

tinyMCE.activeEditor.focus();

tinymce.execCommand(‘mceFocus’,false,’id_of_textarea’);

To cleanly remove an editor instance and avoid any errors use:

tinymce.EditorManager.execCommand(‘mceRemoveEditor’,true, editor_id);
To reinitialize the instance use:

tinymce.EditorManager.execCommand(‘mceAddEditor’,true, editor_id);

tinymce.execCommand(‘mceRemoveControl’, true, ‘my_original_textarea_id’);

entry.title: Scroll IFRAMEs on iOS
entry.content:
.demo-iframe-holder {
  position: fixed;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}

.demo-iframe-holder iframe {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}


http://davidwalsh.name/scroll-iframes-ios
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/26046373/iframe-scrolling-ios-8
entry.summary:
.demo-iframe-holder {
  position: fixed;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}

.demo-iframe-holder iframe {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
}

entry.title: Convert Data URI to File
entry.content:
Data URL给了我们一种很巧妙的将图片“嵌入”到HTML中的方法。
跟传统的用img标记将服务器上的图片引用到页面中的方式不一样，在Data URL协议中，图片被转换成base64编码的字符串形式，并存储在URL中，冠以mime-type。

如果后台不支持我们以base64的格式保存一个图片，我们可能需要把base64转成blob：

function dataURItoBlob(dataURI) {
    // convert base64/URLEncoded data component to raw binary data held in a string
    var byteString;
    if (dataURI.split(',')[0].indexOf('base64') >= 0)
        byteString = atob(dataURI.split(',')[1]);
    else
        byteString = unescape(dataURI.split(',')[1]);

    // separate out the mime component
    var mimeString = dataURI.split(',')[0].split(':')[1].split(';')[0];

    // write the bytes of the string to a typed array
    var ia = new Uint8Array(byteString.length);
    for (var i = 0; i < byteString.length; i++) {
        ia[i] = byteString.charCodeAt(i);
    }

    return new Blob([ia], {type:mimeString});
}

var dataURL = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0.5);
var blob = dataURItoBlob(dataURL);


http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4998908/convert-data-uri-to-file-then-append-to-formdata
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/16968945/convert-base64-png-data-to-javascript-file-objects
http://www.webhek.com/data-url/
entry.summary:
Data URL给了我们一种很巧妙的将图片“嵌入”到HTML中的方法。
跟传统的用img标记将服务器上的图片引用到页面中的方式不一样，在Data URL协议中，图片被转换成base64编码的字符串形式，并存储在URL中，冠以mime-type。

如果后台不支持我们以base64的格式保存一个图片，我们可能需要把base64转成blob：

function dataURItoBlob(dataURI) {
    // convert base64/URLEncoded data component to raw binary data held in a string
    var byteString;
    if (dataURI.split(',')[0].indexOf('base64') >= 0)
        byteString = atob(dataURI.split(',')[1]);
    else
        byteString = unescape(dataURI.split(',')[1]);

    // separate out the mime component
    var mimeString = dataURI.split(',')[0].split(':')[1].split(';')[0];

    // write the bytes of the string to a typed array
    var ia = new Uint8Array(byteString.length);
    for (var i = 0; i < byteString.length; i++) {
        ia[i] = byteString.charCodeAt(i);
    }

    return new Blob([ia], {type:mimeString});
}

var dataURL = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0.5);
var blob = dataURItoBlob(dataURL);

entry.title: insert html where cursor is
entry.content:
关键字：
insert html into div contenteditable
get contenteditable div cursor
div contenteditable mobile

html

<input type="button" value="Paste HTML" onclick="document.getElementById('test').focus(); pasteHtmlAtCaret('<b>INSERTED</b>'); ">

<div id="test" contenteditable="true">
    Here is some nice text
</div>


js

function pasteHtmlAtCaret(html) {
    var sel, range;
    if (window.getSelection) {
        // IE9 and non-IE
        sel = window.getSelection();
        if (sel.getRangeAt && sel.rangeCount) {
            range = sel.getRangeAt(0);
            range.deleteContents();

            // Range.createContextualFragment() would be useful here but is
            // non-standard and not supported in all browsers (IE9, for one)
            var el = document.createElement("div");
            el.innerHTML = html;
            var frag = document.createDocumentFragment(), node, lastNode;
            while ( (node = el.firstChild) ) {
                lastNode = frag.appendChild(node);
            }
            range.insertNode(frag);

            // Preserve the selection
            if (lastNode) {
                range = range.cloneRange();
                range.setStartAfter(lastNode);
                range.collapse(true);
                sel.removeAllRanges();
                sel.addRange(range);
            }
        }
    } else if (document.selection && document.selection.type != "Control") {
        // IE < 9
        document.selection.createRange().pasteHTML(html);
    }
}

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6690752/insert-html-at-caret-in-a-contenteditable-div
http://jsfiddle.net/jwvha/1/
试过了，可以用

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4767848/get-caret-cursor-position-in-contenteditable-area-containing-html-content

entry.title: angularjs controller watch service variable
entry.content:
多个controller会通过service共用变量
如何监听service里值的变化

myApp.controller('MyCtrl', function($scope, myService) {


    $scope.setFTag = function() {
       myService.setFalseTag();
    };

    $scope.$watch(function () {
       return myService.tags;
     },
      function(newVal, oldVal) {
        /*...*/
    }, true);

});
